text_block_list.text:
As I was taking a walk on my day off, 
I stumble upon a familiar face…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Mom? Sorry, I know you're busy, but… 
I wanted to talk about your schedule next month…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Mhm… Yup… Ah, I see. 
Hmm… all right, thank you! I'll see you soon then!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…Alright! Now I know which hotel she's staying at… perfect! 
Now all I've got to do is get her a present and… hehe :3
choice_data_list: Was that your mother on the phone just now?
Was that your mother on the phone just now?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
T-Trainer!? What are you doing here… Wait, don't tell me you've 
been eavesdropping on me. Stop doing that!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh… It's my mom's birthday next month, so I was just confirming where I should send her gift to.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
A surprise birthday gift, to be exact. 
I don't know if she'll be surprised by it, though.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That's why it has to be something that makes her want to say 
"That's my Scarlet!" The number one gift that'll make her happy!
choice_data_list: Mind if I help you find it?
Mind if I help you find it?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
You? 
…Well, at least you can be useful carrying bags for me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Fine, I'll let you go with me. 
Alright, let's get going!

And so, we started walking around town 
to find the right gift, but…
…It was a disaster.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
A necklace? Hmm… 
It's cute, but the design isn't really my mom's style.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
These earrings are really pretty too, but it's too shiny. 
The types mom usually wears have more class…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, what about getting her clothes? Like that brand that's 
number one in terms of popularity and sales…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…and that's pretty much all it has going for it. 
You can find their designs just about anywhere. 
My mom would want something more special.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That's not a bad idea, but… I want to give her 
something special. It's her birthday after all, 
I want to make her as happy as possible.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And I can only do that if it's something only I could come up 
with… I've got to find the number one present for her.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
We've gone through all the places around here. 
Let's go to the mall next!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… There's a lot to choose from, 
but none of them really fit mom.
choice_data_list: You really love your mother, huh.
You really love your mother, huh.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Of course I do! 
After all, my mom is an amazing horse girl!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's one thing that she was a really successful horse 
girl back in her day, but now she's also traveling 
around the world doing all sorts of jobs!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
She's the definition of a capable horse 
girl. She's just wonderful!
choice_data_list: So she's an inspiration to you, I see.
So she's an inspiration to you, I see.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
She wasn't around for the first time I got number one in a race, 
but she left me a voice mail where she said "congratulations."

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I was so happy back then… Even now, whenever I'm number one in 
a race, I always get a message from her.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It was always just a few words, but… 
my mom's messages are my treasure.
choice_data_list: That's why you want to be number one?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
More or less. Well, nowadays there's also the selfish 
reason that I just don't want to lose.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I have to be number one in terms of picking 
out presents too. I won't settle for anything less! 
Alright, let's go to the next place!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
…Ugh… I'm starting to run out of ideas. 
I've thought about food, accessories, shoes… nothing.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hey, do you have any good ideas? 
I'll listen as long as it gives me some inspiration.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But I'll have you know, anything ordinary is out of the question. 
It has to be a special present only I can give!

Something special… the number one thing that 
would make her happy… I've got it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What is it? Have you figured something out?
choice_data_list: Get number one in a race!
Get number one in a race!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Get number one in a race… as a birthday gift?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… well, that's not a bad idea… I guess? 
Mom always contacts me whenever I get number one, so…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
A number one dedicated to her… If I get number one and say 
"Happy birthday, mom!" during the interview…
choice_data_list: It would be the best birthday ever!
It would be the best birthday ever!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Y-yeah, you're right! 
I probably won't be able to give it to her on the day, but…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's a special present nobody else can give her. 
I'll get number one for her…!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Not bad coming from you. 
You can be proud of that one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Alright! I've made up my mind! I'll get number one on the next 
race for sure! That'd be great for you too, right? Me winning.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Well then, what are we waiting for? 
Let's get straight to training!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Pant… pant… pant… phew.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I might have gone too fast there. I got sweat in my eyes…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …No, I can't just stop now! I've got to try harder!
choice_data_list: I'm sure your mom will be happy.
I'm sure your mom will be happy.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Yeah… It's giving me the will to keep going!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I better start thinking of what to 
say to my mom during the interview too!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Let's keep going, trainer! 
I'll definitely get number one, so… You better work harder too!

The next day, Daiwa Scarlet did an impressive 
job and got "number one".

It was like she reverted back to a child when she got a call from 
her mother. She smiled so happily.
